General.Name: Creotech Instruments S.A.
General.Description: Creotech Instruments S.A. operates in the space and science industry in Poland. The company manufactures aircraft, spacecraft, electronic components, computers and peripheral devices, telecommunication equipment, and similar machines. It also manufactures measuring, control, and navigation instruments and devices, as well as electricity distribution and control apparatus. In addition, the company is involved in specialized design and software businesses. Further, the company offers technical consultancy services. Its CreoDIAS provides cloud platform to satellite data and services. Creotech Instruments S.A. was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Piaseczno, Poland.

1.Name: Mr. Maciej  Kielek
